== MacBook Pro 4,1: Wikis for Ubuntu Versions ==
<<BR>><<BR>>

This page links to wikis for the  '''4-th Generation Mac``Book Pro''' (release date: early 2008).<<BR>>
<<BR>>
<<BR>>
<<BR>>
The following wikis for the Mac``Book Pro 4,1 are available:
* Ubuntu 8.04/8.04.x LTS (Hardy Heron)
* <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBookPro4-1/Intrepid|Ubuntu 8.10 (Intrepid Ibex)]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBookPro4-1/Jaunty|Ubuntu 9.04 (Jaunty Jackalope)]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBookPro4-1/Karmic|Ubuntu 9.10 (Karmic Koala)]]</nowiki>
<<BR>>
<<BR>>
<<BR>>
<<BR>>
* If you have a Mac``Book Pro, but a hardware revision other than 4,1 (release date early 2008), go to the <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBookPro|MacBook Pro main page]]</nowiki>.
* If you have a different Intel CPU-based Macintosh hardware, please go to the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MactelSupportTeam/CommunityHelpPages|Mactel documentation start page]]</nowiki>.
<<BR>>
<<BR>>
If you haven't decided yet, what Ubuntu version to install, have a look at the <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MactelSupportTeam/AppleIntelInstallation?action=AttachFile&do=view&target=ubuntu-release-cycle.png| Ubuntu Distribution Release Cycle Overview.]]</nowiki>
<<BR>>
